text: is a Japanese politician and governor of Fukuoka Prefecture since 2011. In 2015, he was re-elected for a second term.Hiroshi Ogawa reelected as Governor of Fukuoka, Fukuoka Now, April 15, 2015. == References == Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Fukuoka Prefecture Category:Kyoto University alumni Category:Governors of Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Hiroshi Ogawa (politician)
